Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1986...
Released by New York (N) on 3/2/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1986 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/16/1989 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 9/1/1991 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/3/1991 with a Fractured Hip, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Baltimore on 6/23/1992 (Going to CHC: 3B H. Matsunaga, P T. Candiotti. Going to BAL: LF H. Rodriguez, P D. Lowe)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/5/1997, off Jeremy Hernandez (BOS)...
